about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION:


Play at your own risk...

A 1990s handheld game inspired RPG / a playable creepypasta
Explore the world freely, become more powerful, learn magical spells for combat and exploration, locate treasure, hire helpers for battle, get haunted by the ghosts of a family...

STUFF TO DO:


  • Explore the world openly!
  • Progress through deadly Temples in any order!
  • Find collectible RARE BOOKS and mysterious yet powerful CHARMS!
  • Complete the TRADE quest that takes place throughout the world!
  • Recruit and name flunkies to do your bidding and help you in combat!
  • Interact with the strange people that live in the Kingdom!
  • Save the Kingdom!
  • (Encounter the paranormal...)

From what I heard ... the game is haunted. If you play it long enough ... strange things start to happen.
It is said that things may appear on screen to watch you or the dungeons will change and be completely different every time you go into them!
Your character sprite may change into something ... unsettling.
You may find your character's name has been changed to something ... upsetting. Or an item you've never heard of or seen before appeared in your inventory with little to no description. Should you even try to use it...? (Maybe save first)

This game gives you the opportunity to enjoy a fun, classic, RPG adventure in an interesting and funny fantasy world!
But real ghosts inside of the game doesn't want you to play it...


CHARACTERS:


RYNE

A young student of the Evocation Academy. While still learning, their skills are already remarkable compared to their peers which causes their greatest rival to slowly despise them. Such a skilled student, they are capable of learning any sort of magical spell with ease.

When they are thrust into a journey to defeat the Monster Lords ...
They bravely face their new fate.

Minimum:
  • OS *: OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better

short_description: (Ever heard of this haunted game ...?) This is an adventure-rpg-horror game! Explore the world freely! Get around by using magic such as: floating, water walking, and quakes! Combat the Monster Lords and save the Kingdom! (That is... if the ghosts haunting the software want you to)
